lead_paragraph: More than 150,000 people have been forced to flee to other cities or into the countryside, while others have crossed the borders to Saudi Arabia or Oman.

headline.print_headline: Fighting Prompts an Exodus From Yemen, Often on Boats
headline.main: Fighting Prompts an Exodus From Yemen, Often on Boats

snippet: More than 150,000 people have been forced to flee to other cities or into the countryside, while others have crossed the borders to Saudi Arabia or Oman.
abstract: Tens of thousands of Yemenis are risking their lives at sea in effort to escape ongoing violence; more than 240 migrants died in 2014 while crossing the Gulf of Aden.
